Title: Successful flight search
Steps: Navigate to flight search page | Enter departure and arrival locations | Select travel dates | Click on search button
Expected: List of available flights is displayed with costs

Title: Flight search with no results
Steps: Navigate to flight search page | Enter invalid departure and arrival locations | Select travel dates | Click on search button
Expected: No flights found message is displayed

Title: Select a seat successfully
Steps: Search for flights | Select a flight | Choose a preferred seat from available options | Click on continue
Expected: Seat selection is confirmed and proceeds to payment

Title: Payment processing with valid credit card
Steps: Search for flights | Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter valid credit card details | Click on pay button
Expected: Payment is processed successfully and confirmation email is sent

Title: Payment processing with invalid card details
Steps: Search for flights | Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter invalid credit card details | Click on pay button
Expected: Error message indicating invalid card details is displayed

Title: Payment processing with insufficient funds
Steps: Search for flights | Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter credit card with insufficient funds | Click on pay button
Expected: Error message indicating insufficient funds is displayed

Title: Booking confirmation email received
Steps: Search for flights | Select a flight | Choose a seat | Enter valid payment details | Click on pay button | Wait for 5 minutes
Expected: Confirmation email is received with booking details

Title: Real-time seat availability check
Steps: Search for flights | Select a flight | Choose a seat | Refresh seat selection page
Expected: Seat availability is updated in real-time

Title: Successful navigation to flight booking
Steps: Open the application | Navigate to flight booking section
Expected: User is successfully navigated to the flight booking section

Title: System startup and basic navigation
Steps: Open the application | Check if the homepage loads | Navigate to flight search page
Expected: Homepage loads successfully and user can navigate to flight search page
